name: Tombstone
desc: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

name: Blade Dance
desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

name: Hoof Stomp
desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

name: Mortal Strike
desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge.

name: Time Lock
desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

name: Rolling Thunder
desc:
Pangolier curls into a magic-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Warcry
desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Heat-Seeking Missile
desc: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Empowering Haste
desc: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds.
